metadata.name: Updated Chronoscope (ZA WARUDO) Dev
metadata.description:
Take control of the world with this amazing timeless item!
Gain the ability to stop time for all but yourself for a few seconds with this definately-not-a-jojo-ripoff item!
This mod is an updated version of Sora's long defunct Chronoscope mod. Repentance-compatible and most old synergies (and some new additional ones) should function.
The shaders and certain mechanics have also been changed. TODO for future releases: Fix familiars, laser items other than brimstone and tech, and most brimstone synergies.
Obviously, huge thanks to Sora for the base code.
